cars.description: This is a fixer-upper of a 2006 Maronda Misfit with only 8999 miles on it. Leather seats, power everything.
This is an immaculate 2006 Porky Dingleberry with only 7999 miles on it. Cloth seats, self vacuuming.
This is a rusty 2006 Geheimniss Haskell with only 9999 miles on it. Corduroy seats, removable antenna.
This is a mostly functioning 2006 Dracula Biscuit with only 10999 miles on it. Snake leather seats, cassette deck.
This is an immature 2006 Ferrel Hamstring with only 11999 miles on it. Metal seats, complimentary fast food bags.
This is an outstanding 2006 Baguettey Showercurtain with only 15999 miles on it. Blessed church pews, baptismal font.
